physicalTable.name: Year
physicalTable.description: Example with different physical SQL for different database types.

selectStatements.query: select distinct datepart(year, OrderDate) as Year from orders
select distinct year(OrderDate) as year from Orders
select distinct TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'yyyy'), '9999')  as Year from orders
select distinct year(OrderDate) as year from Orders
select distinct year(OrderDate) as year from Orders
select distinct extract(year from OrderDate) as
select distinct extract(year from OrderDate) as
select distinct {fn year(OrderDate)} as year from Orders
